# Iron Scarf (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Metal (Domain)|Metal 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]], [[1st Level Wu Jen Spells|Wu jen 1]] (metal)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (the silk scarf)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Complete Arcane (WotC), pg. 112

When you cast this spell, you flick a silk scarf at one creature within range, magically propelling it toward the target. The scarf assumes an iron-like hardness on the way. You must have line of sight to the target and hit with a normal ranged attack with the scarf. If you hit, the target takes 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5).

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Metal 1 to Level per Oriental Adventures; added Sorcerer 1, Wizard 1 to Level.
